title: Unnai Partha Pinbu Naan Lyrics Kadhal Mannan
stanzas: <div>Unnai Partha Pinbu Naan Song Lyrics Kadhal Mannan

Unnai paartha pinbu naan
naanaaga illaiye
en ninaivu therinthu naan
idhupola illaiye

ivale ivale endru
idhayam thelindhen
ilamai ilamai paadhithen

kollai konda andha nilaa
enai kondru kondru
thindrathe

Yen pirandhen endru
nana irundhen
unnai paartha vudan
unmai naan arindhen

ennuyiril nee paadhi endru
un kanmaniyil naan
kandu kondaen.

nee varuvaayo
illai maraivaayo
ye ye ye yen

nee neruppu endru
therindha pinnum
unai thoda thunindhen
enna thunichaladi

manamagalaai unnai
paartha pinnum
unnai sirai edukka
manam thudikkuthadi

nee varuvaayo
illai maraivaayo
ye ye ye yen

Unnai paartha pinbu naan
naanaaga illaiye
en ninaivu therinthu naan
idhupola illaiye

ivale ivale endru
idhayam thelindhen
ilamai ilamai paadhithen

kollai konda andha nilaa
enai kondru kondru
thindrathe
